newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi Arabia slams Israel settlement plan.
newsitem.headline: Saudi Arabia slams Israel settlement plan.

text.p: Saudi Arabia condemned Israel's decision to build new housing for Jews in Arab East Jerusalem as part of its plots to destroy the city's Islamic and Arab identity.

The Saudi cabinet said in a statement following a weekly meeting on Monday night that the kingdom -- home of two of Islam's holiest shrines -- viewed the Israeli decision as "illegal and illegitimate as well as constituting a serious violation of international treaties and accords".

The statement, carried by the official Saudi Press Agency, said the Israeli move showed the Jewish state was "proceeding with its plans aimed at the Judaisation of Jerusalem and obliterating its Islamic identity and Arab character".
Israel's approval last week of the housing plan has sparked criticism from key ally Washington and drawn Palestinian warnings that it could unleash bloodshed.
